nodes.text: Nerrif was a Galactic Republic space station on the Mid Rim.

Near the end of the Clone Wars, Omega Squad and Delta Squad were redeployed from Haurgab to Coruscant via Nerrif. It was here that Jedi General Etain Tur-Mukan revealed to her lover Darman Skirata, a clone commando of Omega Squad, that they had a son, Venku Skirata.
